akn:content.akn:p: Subject to applicable requirements of this subchapter and subchapter I of this chapter, a mutual insurance holding company may:

A merger or acquisition pursuant to this section is subject to the applicable procedures prescribed by the District laws applying to mutual insurance companies, except as otherwise provided in this subsection. The Commissioner may retain, at the expense of the mutual insurance company, any attorneys, actuaries, accountants, and other experts not otherwise a part of the Commissionerâ€™s staff as may be reasonably necessary to assist the Commissioner in reviewing the proposed merger or acquisition.
